Name: Frame of Mind
About the game: In Frame of Mind, you are placed in a world where logic is escaping you. Each area of the game defies reason, requiring you to think outside the box in order to solve the illogical and escape madness. 15+ reality-defying puzzles A world that conforms to your observation 30+ minutes of mind-bending gameplay Speedrun Mode (Unlock upon completing the Game) This game was made by [Sample Text] Studios, a group of 6 in their 2nd year of studying at Media Design School, New Zealand. Need help on a puzzle? Want to talk to the devs? Join our [Sample Text] community discord server here ! CONTROLS ⯈ Mouse To Look ⯈ 'W' 'A' 'S' 'D' To Move ⯈ Space To Jump ⯈ 'ESC' To Pause
